title: How can hypnosis help with self-improvement, rejuvenation, and sexual issues?
first_phrase: This text discusses the power of the mind and techniques like hypnosis to improve oneself, including physical appearance, sexual performance, and emotional well-being. It also explores the relationship between natural human behavior and the societal norms that attempt to suppress sexuality. The last 200 tokens include a discussion on various sexual behaviors such as monogamy, polygamy, polyandry, and polyamory, and how they relate to human behavior. The text emphasizes the need to explore and embrace natural tendencies while recognizing the influence of cultural norms.

Infatti la società attuale si è costituita a partire da una società agricola basata sulla proprietà della terra. E per garantire stabilità della proprietà, soprattutto terriera, è necessario fissità della famiglia in nuclei ristretti.
